body:
While trying out helm 3 I noticed that making an invalid change to a `ClusterRoleBinding` does not cause the upgrade to fail.
I tried changing the referenced role name which is not allowed by the k8s api. To my surprise helm is reporting a patch failure but marks the release as successful nonetheless.
```
> helm3 upgrade error . --set Name=blafasel --debug
upgrade.go:79: [debug] preparing upgrade for error
upgrade.go:87: [debug] performing update for error
upgrade.go:225: [debug] creating upgraded release for error
client.go:149: [debug] checking 1 resources for changes
client.go:404: Cannot patch ClusterRoleBinding: "error" (ClusterRoleBinding.rbac.authorization.k8s.io "error" is invalid: roleRef: Invalid value: rbac.RoleRef{APIGroup:"rbac.authorization.k8s.io", Kind:"ClusterRole", Name:"blafasel"}: cannot change roleRef)
upgrade.go:94: [debug] updating status for upgraded release for error
Release "error" has been upgraded. Happy Helming!
NAME: error
LAST DEPLOYED: Mon Oct 28 19:14:35 2019
NAMESPACE: default
STATUS: deployed
REVISION: 3
TEST SUITE: None
USER-SUPPLIED VALUES:
Name: blafasel

COMPUTED VALUES:
Name: blafasel
affinity: {}
fullnameOverride: ""
image:
  pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  repository: nginx
imagePullSecrets: []
ingress:
  annotations: {}
  enabled: false
  hosts:
  - host: chart-example.local
    paths: []
  tls: []

podSecurityContext: {}

  port: 80
  type: ClusterIP
serviceAccount:
  create: true
  name: null
tolerations: []

HOOKS:
MANIFEST:
---
# Source: patch-error/templates/clusterrolebinding.yaml
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRoleBinding
metadata:
  name: "error"
subjects:
- kind: ServiceAccount
  name: "whatever"
  namespace: "default"
roleRef:
  kind: ClusterRole #this must be Role or ClusterRole
  name: blafasel
  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
```

To reproduce this just create a simple chart which contains the following template:
```
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRoleBinding
metadata:
  name: "{{ .Release.Name }}"
subjects:
- kind: ServiceAccount
  name: "whatever"
  namespace: "{{ default .Release.Namespace  .Values.Namespace}}"
roleRef:
  kind: ClusterRole #this must be Role or ClusterRole
  name: {{ default .Release.Name .Values.Name }}
  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
```
Install with `helm install error-ignored CHART`. Upgrade with `helm upgrade error-ignored CHART --set Name=whatever`
